name: Mathematics
description: Includes all levels of math from grade school to college level courses.

name: Science
description: All science courses starting in grade school to college courses fall in this subject.

name: English
description: All levels of the English language are encompasses in this subject.

name: Social Studies
description: Includes grade school topics as well as focuses in economics, humanities, history, politics, psychology and more.

name: Computer Science
description: This subject includes all topics relating to computing and software. Beginner Programmers to Advanced Software Engineers can all connect here.

name: SAT/ACT/Other Test Prep
description: This subject may involve tutors aiding students in any form of standardized test as tutors prefer.

name: Life Skills
description: This can include topics like personal finance, communication and more.

name: Competitions
description: This subject option encompasses academic competitions in the various subjects. If students want private tutoring for competitions like AMC, MathCounts or the Olympiads, they would come here.
